title: Apartment For Sale in Marine City - City View
location: 201/A/2, Co-op Lane, Honnanthara North, Piliyandala, Dehiwala
details:
APARTMENT FOR SALE IN MARINE CITY

Come See This Charming Ranch With An Open Floor Plan And Breathtaking Views.

This Apartment has 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms with Maids Room & Bathroom has a floor area of 1450 and located in a Higher floor with city views.

Investment is just 32 Million LKR!

The Premises Include Many Facilities Such As a Club House, Magnificent Swimming Pool, Sauna, Beauty Salon And a Gym, One Designated Car Park.
